body:
Finally, some good fatty porn with no bullshit to toughen through. No cheating, no anal no rape, no weird looking characters, shota/loli, futa, mind break, hypnosis, humiliation, incest, interpescies, nothing. Just good old fashioned passionate love making, between a feminine woman well endowed all around her body instead of the usual Three Ts (Tits Tum Tush), and a fairly built man, kissing, groping, fondling and fucking almost every inch of this woman as a woman with a body like hers deserves. 

After putting up with so much unattractive weird shit in porn just because it had a small amount of what I desperately look for, this is cathartic to see. Even the weirdish thing they do in the beginning where they each make each other Cum into their hands and they press their hands together, that's weordly Wholesome in itself, as I assume is what it's meant to be. I need more wholesome vanilla stuff like this, which is apparently in very short supply, especially on here.
This is the best after read so many "normal" doujin, people that says "ew" is sick.
People who don't find this appealing should really go and check their testosterone levels.
How do you eat that much
lose weight you blob of lard
